Get path to {ipumseasyr} package cache directory

Source: R/cache_ipumsr_data.R
ipumsr_cache_dir.Rd

Get path to {ipumseasyr} package cache directory

Usage

ipumsr_cache_dir(pkg = "ipumseasyr", recursive = TRUE)

Arguments

recursive

logical. Should elements of the path other than the last be created? If true, like the Unix command mkdir -p.
